text: Calidviana is a genus of tropical and subtropical land snails with an operculum, terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Helicinidae. == Species == Species within the genus Calidviana include: * Calidviana littoricola (Gundlach in Pfeiffer, 1860)"Mollusca" . Diversidad Biológica Cubana, accessed 23 March 2011. == References == Category:Helicinidae
title: Calidviana
